guiSET.core

Class VScrollContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiSET.core.Control
      • guiSET.core.TextBased
        • guiSET.core.Container
          • guiSET.core.VFlowContainer
            • guiSET.core.VScrollContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ListView, MultilineTextbox

    public class VScrollContainer
extends VFlowContainer
    A Container that layouts its content vertically and enables a scrollbar if the content overflows.
    Author:
    Mc-Zen
